page.title: 13Strathairly Game Farm(cont)
page.content: These older birds (often rearing stock)are fed pelleted feed while the chicks are fed crumbled feed; i.e.ground pelleted feed.The farm uses 140_160 tonnes of this special feed a year along with 30 tonnesof wheat. Most of the chicks and six week old birds go to Perthshire and Aberdeenshire;supplying them to the sporting estates throught Tayside and the south east corner of the Grampian Region.There are very few markets within Fife.The birds are mainly sold between April and August. Rearing Units hood between two and three hundred chicks ,The birds being kept in the heated shelter until they grow large enough to live safely in all three parts of the rearing unit.
